AND REG_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND MOD_DTM >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strtDt}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND REG_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND MOD_DTM < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDt}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND (

)
AND (
EXPS_YN = #{expsYn}
)
AND TITL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND ( INSTR(#{q}, A.REG_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
AND ( INSTR(#{q}, MOD_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
AND ( INSTR(#{q}, TITL) > 0 OR INSTR(#{q}, REG_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) OR INSTR(#{q}, MOD_ID) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(#{q}, NAME) > 0) )
